definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Sippy and directed by Ramesh Sippy, released in 1975.
sentences.chinese: 播出，並指示由拉梅什風格，發表於1975年。

sentences.english: Hideyoshi himself brought along two portable teahouses in starkly contrasting styles.
sentences.chinese: 豐臣秀吉本人帶來了兩個風格截然不同的便攜式茶館。

sentences.english: Our products are unique in style and various in color.
sentences.chinese: 公司產品風格獨具，獨樹一幟，花色品種繁多。

sentences.english: Computers let you try out different styles and ideas.
sentences.chinese: 電腦能讓你嘗試不同的風格和點子。

sentences.english: Is no substitute for showing off the core of her unique style.
sentences.chinese: 是否展露了無可取代的獨特風格纔是核心所在。

sentences.english: It becomes second nature to adapt your own style to that of the person with whom you are speaking.
sentences.chinese: 這成爲將你的風格與談話者相適應的第二天性。

sentences.english: Some techniques could be applied to improve its quality and to strengthen its Maotai-flavor styles.
sentences.chinese: 可採取一些方法提高質量，突出醬香風格。

sentences.english: Our packing is in Chinese national style , and suitable for display in super-market.
sentences.chinese: 我們的包裝具有中國民族風格，適於在超級市場陳列。

sentences.english: Before bed, standing in the wood-rich hall of the Russian Hill house, she counted her cash.
sentences.chinese: 睡覺前，她站在俄羅斯風格房子的木客廳，算錢。

sentences.english: What style of music do you like?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡哪種風格的音樂？

sentences.english: Julie prefers the gothic architectural style while I like romanesque .
sentences.chinese: 朱莉偏愛哥特式建築風格，而我則更喜歡羅馬式的。

sentences.english: A selection of long- sleeved casual shirts featuring contemporary and classic styles.
sentences.chinese: 精選的長袖休閒襯衫採用現代和古典風格。

sentences.english: Be open to new ideas, new ways of seeing things and new styles.
sentences.chinese: 要開放地接納新觀點，看事物的新角度，新風格。

sentences.english: This sort of meta-programming style does not lend itself to static type checking.
sentences.chinese: 這種元程序風格很難進行靜態類型覈查。

sentences.english: In the example, add the genre of a movie as its own field.
sentences.chinese: 在這個例子中，添加了電影風格作爲內容類型的字段。

sentences.english: As a result, they try to lead a chemical-free lifestyle.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人們想要引領一種無化學的生活風格。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to stand out from the masses (idiom)
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
